name: $draft
desc: The study is currently being executed

name: $in-progress
desc: Execution of the study has been temporarily paused

name: $suspended
desc: The study was terminated prior to the final determination of results

name: $stopped
desc: The information sought by the study has been gathered and compiled and no further work is being performed

name: $completed
desc: This study never actually existed.  The record is retained for tracking purposes in the event decisions may have been made based on this erroneous information.
